desc: Draws an ellipse on the screen.

args.name: x
args.desc: The x coord of ellipse center.

args.name: y
args.desc: The y coord of ellipse center.

args.name: rx
args.desc: The radius of the ellipse along the x-axis (half the ellipse's width).

args.name: ry
args.desc: The radius of the ellipse along the y-axis (half the ellipse's height).

args.name: l
args.desc: (false/nil) The ellipse will be filled, (true) The ellipse will have only lines (outline).

args.name: r
args.desc: The color of the ellipse (0-15), defaults to the active color.

args.name: seg
args.desc: The number of the segments used when drawing the ellipse.

note: The arguments can be passed in a table
